title: I didn't get a Mystery Gift? Help Please
body: So my friend told me about the whole free skin from Riot, and at this point I didn't know about it so I checked my account and I didn't get one....thats fine, he said it may take some time since his brother didn't get one either yet so I waited. I don't know the full details but the more I wait, the more I think I'm not gonna get one. He said something about Good Behaviour, and while I haven't been the best league player over the years I know I'm not such a nuisance to the community. Do I not get one because I've been muted before? or is it just some glitch? If it is because I've been muted before, I really think Riot should re-evaluate their reporting system. I'm not saying I should've never been muted because I'm the nicest person in the world....I'm just saying that a pre made team can get you muted by reporting you just because one of them don't like you, it's happened to me plenty of times so I would know + It's happened to my friends as well. If it is because I've been muted, I'd be pretty disappointed because I missed out on a great opportunity to get a free skin from the Company that made the game I love to play, but oh well I guess thats what I get lol

replies.body: You didn't answer my question, does getting muted affect it?

> [{quoted}](name=DinoMuncher,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=GtjNN02o,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-01-10T05:19:39.731+0000)
>
> You didn't answer my question, does getting muted affect it?

lol no.

You won't get one is you have been either:
Chat Restricted
Ranked Restricted
14 Day Banned
Permanently Banned

in 2014.
Also, you are only eligible is you are:
Over Level 5
You have a minimum of 10 skins that you don't own.

Other than that, be patient.
Yay, so no skin for me since I've been muted before. Thats awesome
ITT toxic kid crying about not getting a skin.
"toxic {{champion:29}} kid crying about not getting a skin" kinda hypocritical of you don't you think?
